name: Kyobu
description:
- Move with WASD
- Shoot blocks with the mouse
- Stack blocks on the left to create lines and score points
- Dash with space to push blocks

Made for the GMTKJam 2018 !! 

Kyobu is a game deeply inspired by Tetris, but where we removed all the "Blocks manipulation" mechanic from the game. 

Instead you play a hero who must carve the blocks and bump them to survive.

This game was made in 48 hours. 

DUTIL Antoine      - Code 
BOMBAIL Hugo      - Art
CLAISSE Jean      - Sounds
